claim: Cell- and egg-based flu vaccines have the potential to develop mutations during production, which may reduce their effectiveness.
explanation: Header page of the scientific journal Vaccine (Elsevier), showing the journal title and homepage URL but no substantive content about vaccine production methods or mutations. The image contains only the journal title and branding and does not present any data or statements about cell- or egg-based flu vaccine production, mutations, or effectiveness, so it does not support the claim. Note: The image quality is clear but limited to header information; no relevant content is shown.
